# NGINX: 0.46.0

# 2021-04-30T23:04:49Z

Link: https://github.com/kubernetes/ingress-nginx/releases/tag/controller-v0.46.0

Image:

  • k8s.gcr.io/ingress-nginx/controller:v0.46.0@sha256:52f0058bed0a17ab0fb35628ba97e8d52b5d32299fbc03cc0f6c7b9ff036b61a

Fixes:

  • Remove the possibility of using localhost in ExternalNames as endpoints #7092

Complete changelog here

Important: due to changes in the lua-nginx-module, the image for platform s390x is not available. Please use v0.40.2

# NGINX: 0.45.0

# 2021-04-06T19:11:08Z

Link: https://github.com/kubernetes/ingress-nginx/releases/tag/controller-v0.45.0

Image:

  • k8s.gcr.io/ingress-nginx/controller:v0.45.0@sha256:c4390c53f348c3bd4e60a5dd6a11c35799ae78c49388090140b9d72ccede1755

New Features:

  • Update the Ingress Controller Image to correct OpenSSL CVEs
  • Add support for Jaeger Endpoint #6884
  • Allow Multiple Publish Status Addresses [#6856](#6856

Complete changelog here

Important: due to changes in the lua-nginx-module, the image for platform s390x is not available. Please use v0.40.2
